body:
Hey guys,
Do you know how to make a switch in Minecraft?
If you don't they are very handy and compact.
Here is my video that shows how to make it and shows some examples.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4jc_PClIvrg
Anyway please give it a thumbs up and give me any feedback.
Feedback helps.
Don't forget to comment, like or even subscribe!
Thanks, Endertait.

title: Switches In Minecraft???

replies.body: Why do you make a separate post for every single video you upload? Why not just make a single thread for all your videos there? :/
replies.body_tagged: Why do you make a separate post for every single video you upload? Why not just make a single thread for all your videos there? :/

replies.body: You can make a video hub like NinjaBridge has!
replies.body_tagged: You can make a video hub like NinjaBridge has!

replies.body: Ok that is a really good idea! Every time i update it with a video will go to the top for people to see??
replies.body_tagged: Ok that is a really good idea! Every time i update it with a video will go to the top for people to see??

replies.body: Yes, and you don't need to make a new one every video!
replies.body_tagged: Yes, and you don't need to make a new one every video!

replies.body: Ok will do that from now on.

replies.body: You may want to edit the post because you have some spelling mistakes
replies.body_tagged: You may want to edit the post because you have some spelling mistakes

replies.body: Oh ok I did not realise I will do.
replies.body_tagged: Oh ok I did not realise I will do.

replies.body: btw it's called a T flip flop. If you don't want to name it like that then you could call it a button to lever setup. Makes the title less confusing
replies.body_tagged: btw it's called a T flip flop. If you don't want to name it like that then you could call it a button to lever setup. Makes the title less confusing

replies.body: Ok I actually will change it to that, I forgot it was named t flip flop. Thanks for the feedback :)
